Common¶

class common.config.Config(result)¶

Read JSON Format config file.

static load_conf(conf_file_path)¶

Read .json file

Parameters:conf_file_path – .json file path
Returns:conf instance
common.convmd2html.conv_md2html(md_text)¶

Convert markdown text to HTML

Parameters:md_text – markdown text
Returns:html
class common.singleton.Singleton¶

Singleton Base Class

Example:

class DocumentTraceQueue(object):
    from common import Singleton
    __metaclass__ = Singleton
common.static_converter.convert_static_html(config, contents)¶

Render plate template to HTML

In case of python plate.py -m convert use this method.

Parameters:
  • config – config instance
  • contents – converted html from markdown
Returns:

rendered html
common.syntax_highlighting.syntax_highlight(lang, code)¶

code highlighting HTML Format

Parameters:
  • lang – programming language
  • code – code
Returns:

highlighted code
